item.description:
Wildcat is only $46 this Sunday in honor of the Patriots playing in Superbowl 46.  Lets hit some of Wildcats famous cruising runs like Lynx, Polecat and Wildcat trail. I am an advanced snowboarder but will do a few runs with any skill level, if you need some coaching/advice -  I can help with that too.

If people get separated we will meet for lunch up in the bar area at 1pm.  Table service is relatively inexpensive at Wildcat.

After I will watch the Superbowl, let me know if you are interested in sticking around and I will send you details.
item.how_to_find_us: meet on top floor, near entrance to bar, I wear all Green

group.name: Boston Ski, Snowboard, and Outdoor Adventurers Meetup Group

item.name: $46 Wildcat Sunday
